Resting o_ floating lea___ and veget_____ lets wa___ striders bl___ into th___ surroundings. Their large prominent eyes help them avoid predators.
data.fullContent: Water striders are eaten by birds, fish, frogs,and aquatic insects. They are especially vulnerable when mating. One defense against predators is camouflage. Resting on floating leaves and vegetation lets water striders blend into their surroundings. Their large prominent eyes help them avoid predators.
data.answer: 水黾是鸟类、鱼类、青蛙和水生昆虫的食物。它们在交配时尤其脆弱。防御捕食者的一种方法是伪装。在漂浮的树叶和植被上休息，让水漫游者融入周围的环境。它们突出的大眼睛帮助它们躲避捕食者。
